page.title: 11Employment in Storrington
page.content: Unlike many areas of Britain, Storrington has a low rate of unemployment. People who live here have many different jobs. Some work on the Industrial Estate, others at Linfield Mushrooms. People also work at the Tile Factory, in the local shopping centre, on the nearby farms, at Gatwick Airport and even commute to London. A survey of the pupils in our school showed that most of the mothers {do}work and that they work locally. This is either because their husbands have the car or they have children to look after. Today more mothers tend to work outside the home rather than being purely housewives. Most of the fathers also work locally, but some do travel up to 60 miles to work each day.
